text: Tyastai prakarale hamile tapa'itira arabi kura'ana patha'eka chaum, taki tapa'ile makkaka basindaharula'i ra yasako varipari basneharula'i khabaradara garnus ra uniharula'i kiyamatako dinako barema pani bhaya dekha'unus, jasama kunai sanka chaina. Tyasadina e'uta samuha svargama hunecha ra eka samuha narkama hunecha
